Html:
Simple question, I have the following:

<ListBox ItemsSource="{Binding Path=LoadedData}" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="2" Margin="5" Padding="1" BorderThickness="1" BorderBrush="#FF818A90" />

Yet, I can't get the border to show.
The ListBox mui style didn't take the border properties into account. I checked in a fix for that. Get latest source and re-compile the mui project
